thread.title: Re: OOPS: Chelsea Clinton shares ‘important thread’ about Japanese camps, forgets mommie dearest praised FDR
thread.title_full: Re: OOPS: Chelsea Clinton shares ‘important thread’ about Japanese camps, forgets mommie dearest praised FDR

author: journogal
title: Re: OOPS: Chelsea Clinton shares ‘important thread’ about Japanese camps, forgets mommie dearest praised FDR
text:
OOPS: Chelsea Clinton shares thread about internment camps, forgets mommie dearest praised FDR Posted at 11:44 am on February 20, 2017 by Sam J. 
Once a Clinton, always a Clinton. This thread is important: https://t.co/6p3GxoCTOU 
— Chelsea Clinton (@ChelseaClinton) February 19, 2017 
Yeah, this is an important thread because it reminds us all of that time a Democrat put a bunch of Japanese-Americans in camps. On this day, 75 yrs ago, #EO9066 was issued, which set in motion the internment of 100,000+ Japanese-Americans. pic.twitter.com/0yBZ9x6G0Y 
— JP SchnapperCasteras (@jpscasteras) February 19, 2017 
Stinkin’ Democrats, and man, that goes DOUBLE for FDR. 
Oh wait. 
— Ben McDonald (@Bmac0507) February 19, 2017 Trending
